backend/main.mo: Defines service and booking types, stores them in maps, and exposes methods to add services, request bookings, and query services or bookings.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata listing features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of key frontend files including pages, hooks, layout, styles, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and utility setup defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark mode theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps pages in the AppLayout component.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout component with header, navigation, mobile menu, identity-based login/logout, and page wrapper.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and refreshes a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for loading services, single service details, submitting booking requests, and fetching user bookings via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that initializes React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Booking.tsx: Booking form page allowing users to submit service booking requests with validation and ICP login handling.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Homepage displaying a hero section and feature highlights with navigation to services and bookings.
frontend/src/pages/MyBookings.tsx: User bookings page showing login prompt, loading state, and a list of the user's booking records.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetails.tsx: Service detail page fetching and displaying a service with description, coverage, and booking navigation.
frontend/src/pages/Services.tsx: React page that displays services with search, locality filter, and navigation to service details.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current features, pending requests, image requirements, and overall app objectives.
